title: Washington DC Typecon 2014
author: Daniel Peterson

comments.content:
Not quite the same but similar issues [http://typophile.com/node/116364](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317104418/http:/typophile.com/node/116364 "http://typophile.com/node/116364")  
Still looking.  
Don
I think it’s based on [Maison Neue Mono](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317104418/http:/www.milieugrotesque.com/typeface-maisonneue).

Congratulations Akira, I do believe you have found the base.  
When I take MaisonNeueMono, set parallel lines at 50 points and clip the terminals on \_2\_, \_C\_, \_G\_ and \_S\_ by 50 points, I get this:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317104418im_/http:/typophile.com/files/MaisonNeueMonoBlacked_6699.jpg)
  
Don

You are correct. This is a custom variation of Milieu Grotesque’s Maison Neue Mono created specifically for the TypeCon 2014 identity by [Build](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317104418/http:/wearebuild.com/).
